data.title: Teams For Sale
meta_keywords: Minor League baseball teams for sale
Minor League hockey teams for sale
data.meta_description: Sports teams for sale. The Sports Advisory Group represents clients in the sale and acquisition of Minor and Major League sports teams.
data.text:
The Sports Advisory Group represents clients in the sale and acquisition of Minor and Major League sports teams. We also regularly advise both buyers and sellers on transactions involving minority or limited partnership stakes in teams or other entities. We understand the complexity surrounding the purchase or sale of a non-control stake in a franchise or other assets which allows us to successfully execute minority and limited partnership deals for our clients.

Contact: Jesse Grant, Senior Associate

Phone: (845) 612-9323

E-mail: jesse@thesportsadvisorygroup.com

Contact: Bill Yates, Senior Associate

Phone: (213) 293-9970

E-mail: byates@sportsadvancement.com

Not sure how to find the right ownership opportunity?

Inquire about our comprehensive Buyer Representation Services, where we do the work for you. We can open doors that may appear closed, then confidentially work alongside you in all the due diligence gathering, analysis and operations reviews, contract negotiations, and league coordination.

Contact: Tommy George, President

Phone: (240) 409-6297

E-mail: tgeorge@thesportsadvisorygroup.com

Contact: Bill Yates, Senior Associate
